::Darkmouse::

Darkmouse looks up at Megaton, her eyes narrowed. She didn't forgive 
as easily as DrillBit, and she would watch Megaton carefully. 
Compared to Megaton, she was very very tiny, but she'd still fight 
him one on one if it game down to that.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He wasn't frightened by Megaton. He was always confident in his own
> abilities.
> "All can be forgotton, including that incedent."
